S01sumagavu:455: nāpy anenāpi tu yata eva tvayā gṛhītas tatraiva gatvāvasthito; 'pi tu,
S01sumagavu:457: svakaṃ te gṛhaṃ yāvadbhir maṇibhir anyena vā prayojanam tāvad gṛhāṇa yathāsukham iti.
S01sumagavu:458: SumAv_168 sa pratibhinnakaḥ saṃlakṣayate: yadā pitur atyayād rājā bhaviṣyāmi, tadā grahīṣyāmīti.
S01sumagavu:459: SumAv_169 yadājātaśatruṇā devadattavigrāhitena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
S01sumagavu:460: svayam eva ca paṭṭaṃ baddhvā rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ,
S01sumagavu:464: SumAv_170 eṣa samlakṣayati: yena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ praghātitaḥ,
S01sumagavu:465: sa mām marṣayatīti. kuta etan. nūnam ayaṃ madgṛham āgacchatu,
S01sumagavu:467: bibhaktam eva. kim atra vibhaktavyam. madīyaṃ gṛham āgaccha. ahaṃ tvadīyaṃ gṛham āgacchāmīti.
S01sumagavu:469: evam kuru. sa tasya gṛhaṃ gataḥ. eṣo 'pi ajātaśatror gṛhaṃ gatah. sā śrīs tasmād gṛhād antarhitā yatraiṣa jyotiṣkas tatraiva gatā. evaṃ yāvat sapta vārān antarhitā prādurbhūtā ca.
S01sumagavu:470: SumAv_172 ajātaśatruḥ saṃlakṣayate: evam api mayā na śakitaṃ jyotiṣkasya maṇīn apahartum, anyad upāyaṃ karomi.
S01sumagavu:471: SumAv_173 tena dhūrtapuruṣāḥ prayuktā: gacchata, jyotiṣkasya gṛhān maṇīn apaharateti.
S01sumagavu:472: SumAv_174 te hi śiṭākarkaṭakaprayogenābhiroḍhum ārabdhāḥ. te 'ntaḥpurikayā upariprāsādatalagatayā dṛṣṭāḥ,
S01sumagavu:475: anenāśayato vāg niścarita: tiṣṭhantu dhūrtakā iti. teṣāṃ yo yatrābhirūḍhaḥ,
S01sumagavu:479: te kathayanti: bhavanto 'nena kalirājena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopita,
S01sumagavu:481: tat kiṃ na me muṣiṣyata iti. purakṣobho jātaḥ.
S01sumagavu:482: SumAv_177 ajātaśatruṇāsya jyotiṣkasya dūto 'nupreṣito: muñcata, mamāyaṃ khalīkāra iti.
S01sumagavu:483: SumAv_178 anena jyotiṣkenāśayato vāg niścāritā: gacchantu dhūrtakā iti. te gatāḥ.
S01sumagavu:484: SumAv_179 athaiṣa jyotiskaḥ saṃlakṣayate: yena nāma pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
S01sumagavu:485: sa māṃ na praghātayisyatīti. kuta etat. sarvathāhaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛto:
S01sumagavu:486: mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhattvaṃ sākṣāt kariṣyatīti. gacchāmi, pravrajāmīti.
S01sumagavu:487: SumAv_180 anena sarvaṃ dhanajātaṃ dīnānathakṛpaṇebhyo dattam,
S01sumagavu:489: SumAv_181 atrāntareṇāyuṣmān kapphiṇo vicitraratnācalam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:490: SumAv_182 taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
S01sumagavu:491: 'yaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ vicitraratnācalam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:492: SumAv_183 sā kathayati: nāyam āryaḥ kapphiṇo, yo 'yaṃ bhagavatā vigatamadadarpāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ.
S01sumagavu:493: SumAv_184 yo 'yaṃ rājā mahākapphiṇa ekasmin samaye aṣṭādaśāmātyasahasraparivṛto mṛgavadhāya nirgataḥ.
S01sumagavu:494: SumAv_185 purastāt pṛṣṭhataś ca sarvabalaugham avalokyāmātyān āmantrayate: asti,
S01sumagavu:496: kasyacid evaṃrūpo balaughas tadyathā mamaitarhīti. te kathayanti: deva, nānyasya kasyacit.
S01sumagavu:497: SumAv_186 yāvad anena mahākapphiṇena rājñā śrāvastyādiṣu ṣaṭsu mahānagareṣu dūtaṃ preṣitam:
S01sumagavu:499: śīghram āgantavyam; anyathā ced uttamena daṇḍena samanuśāsiṣyāmīti.
S01sumagavu:500: SumAv_187 etad vacanam upaśrutya ṣaṇmahānagaravāsino rājāno bhītās trastāḥ saṃvignāḥ samāgamya śrāvastīṃ gatvā bhagavate etad vṛttāntaṃ nivedayanti.
S01sumagavu:503: sa dūto matsakāśam ānetavya iti. tair dūtasya niveditam:
S01sumagavu:504: asty asmākam rājādhirājas, taṃ tāvat paśyeti.
S01sumagavu:505: SumAv_189 bhagavatā jetavanam catūratnamayaṃ nirmitaṃ devānām iva sudarśanaṃ nagaraṃ catvāro mahārājā dauvārikāḥ sthāpitāḥ,
S01sumagavu:510: svayaṃ ca bhagavāṃś cakravartiveśam ātmānam abhinirmāya saptatālodgate mahāratnasiṃhāsane niṣaṇnāḥ.
S01sumagavu:511: SumAv_190 dūtas tathāvidhāṃ śobhāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ.
S01sumagavu:517: aham eva mahatā balaughena sārdham āgamiṣyamīti.
S01sumagavu:518: SumAv_192 dūtena mahākapphiṇasya tat sarvaṃ saṃdiṣṭaṃ niveditam.
S01sumagavu:519: SumAv_193 ayaṃ kapphiṇo rājāṣṭādaśāmātyasahasraparivṛtaḥ śrāvastīm anupraveśya jetavanaṃ praviṣṭaḥ,
S01sumagavu:520: sahadarśanād asya yo rūpe rūpamada aiśvarye aiśvaryamadaḥ sa prativigataḥ,
S01sumagavu:522: SumAv_194 tato bhagavatā laukikaṃ cittam utpāditam: aho bata,
S01sumagavu:523: śakro devānām indra aindraṃ dhanur ādāyāgacched iti.
S01sumagavu:524: SumAv_195 sahacittotpādād bhagavataḥ śakro devānām indraḥ sārathiveśenaindraṃ dhanur upanāmitavān. tato bhagavatā tad dhanur upanāmitam. tad utkṣeptum api na śaknoti,
S01sumagavu:526: SumAv_196 tato bhagavatā saptāyomayyo bheryo nirmitāḥ,
S01sumagavu:527: svayam eva tad dhanur ardhacandrākāreṇāropya śaraḥ kṣipto yena saptāyomayyo bheryaś chidrīkṛtās,
S01sumagavu:530: dhūnīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāraṃ iva kuñjaraḥ //
S01sumagavu:531: SumAv_198 yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
S01sumagavu:533: SumAv_199 sa ca śabdo yāvad akaniṣṭhān devān gataḥ, tato 'sya yo 'bhūd baladarpaḥ sa prativigataḥ.
S01sumagavu:534: SumAv_200 tato bhagavatāsya cittam ājñāya rājaveśam antardhāpya dharmo deśitah. yenāṣṭādaśāmātyasahasraparivāreṇa yāvac chrotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣāt kṛtavān,
S01sumagavu:535: tato dṛṣṭasatyaś ca bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajitaḥ. so 'yam āgaccati. (17)
S01sumagavu:536: SumAv_201 atrāntareṇāyuṣmān ānandaḥ haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukasārikākokilajīvaṃjīvakanādopakūjitam ārāmam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:537: SumAv_202 taṃ dṛṣṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
S01sumagavu:538: 'yaṃ te sa śāstā yo 'yaṃ haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukasārikākokilajīvaṃjīvakanādopakūjitam ārāmam abhinirmāya tatropaviṣṭa upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:539: SumAv_203 sā kathayati: nāyam ārya ānandaḥ, ayaṃ ca bhagavatā indriyaguptadvārāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ.
S01sumagavu:540: SumAv_204 ayaṃ ca bhagavataś caturbhir aṅgulair ūnaḥ suvarṇavarṇo dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ.
S01sumagavu:541: SumAv_205 anena kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya stūpe madhyamaṃ chattram āropitam. tasya karmaṇo vipākenārdhatṛtīyāni cakravartirājyasahasrāṇi;
S01sumagavu:542: yady etarhi na pravrajito 'bhaviṣyad etarhi apy anena balacakravartirājyam akariṣyat.
S01sumagavu:543: SumAv_206 ayaṃ ca bhagavatā balāt pravrajitaḥ. ayaṃ ca bhagavato mātṛsvasāputro bhrātā bhavati. sa eṣāgacchati. (18)
S01sumagavu:544_0: SumAv_207 atrāntarenāyuṣmān rāhulaś cakravartiveśam abhinirmāya saptaratnasamanvāgataś
S01sumagavu:544_1: caturaśītyā bhaṭabalāgrakoṭibhiḥ samanugamyamānaś caturaśītyā nāgasahasrair upoṣadhanāgarājapramukhaiś
S01sumagavu:545: SumAv_208 taṃ dṛsṭvā sumāgadhāyāḥ svāmī sumāgadhāṃ papraccha: sumāgadhe,
S01sumagavu:548: SumAv_209 sā kathayati: nāyam āryo rāhulo, 'yaṃ bhagavatā śikṣakāmānām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ.
S01sumagavu:549: SumAv_210 bhagavataḥ putro 'yaṃ pitur ujjhitāṃ śriyam uddyotamānaḥ,
S01sumagavu:550: sarvacakravartiprativiśiṣṭatarām ṛddhim upadarśayann upari vihāyasā ṛddhyākāśenāgacchati.
S01sumagavu:554: kṛtvā buddhasuto 'bhyupaiti nabhasā veśaṃ ca rājñām ayaṃ
S01sumagavu:555: nāmnā rāhula ity aveti sumahate sampūjyamānaḥ suraiḥ //
S01sumagavu:556: SumAv_212 bhittvorvīṃ jalavat prayānti munayaḥ kecit sṛjanto 'nalaṃ
S01sumagavu:557: ramyatoyadharā ivāśu jagati spaṣṭaṃ kṣaranto jalam /
S01sumagavu:561: SumAv_213 saṃprasthitesu bhikṣusaṃghesu atrāntareṇa tathāgatapraveśaḥ. bhagavāṃs tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno,
S01sumagavu:562: yathāsamāhite citte bhagavataḥ kāyād raśmayo niścaranti,
S01sumagavu:564: yair ayaṃ loke udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsito yāvac ca śrāvastīṃ yāvac ca puṇḍravardhanaṃ nagaram.
S01sumagavu:565: SumAv_214 atrāntareṇa sarve lokā bhagavantam abhiniṣkramantaṃ paśyanti, mahāṃś ca pṛthivīcālo babhūva.
S01sumagavu:566: SumAv_215 atha brahmā sahāṃpatir bhagavataś cetasā cittam ājñāya sārdhaṃ rūpāvacarair devair āgatya bhagavato dakṣiṇe pārśve vyavasthitaḥ.
S01sumagavu:567: SumAv_216 śakro 'pi devānām indraḥ sārdhaṃ kāmāvacarair devair āgatya vāme pārśve vyavasthitaḥ.
S01sumagavu:568: SumAv_217 tumburusupriyapramukhāni pañcamātrāṇi gandharvaśatāny āgatya bhagavato 'grato vividhair vādyagītanṛttaviśeṣair upasthānaṃ kurvanto gacchanti.
S01sumagavu:569: SumAv_218 anekāni ca devatāśatasahasrāṇi pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti.
S01sumagavu:570: SumAv_219 upariṣṭāc ca bhagavato 'psaraso divyāny utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamāndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi,
S01sumagavu:574: SumAv_220 tena khalu punaḥ samayenānyatarasmin araṇyāyatane sapta ṛṣisahasrāṇi prativasanti.
S01sumagavu:575: SumAv_221 adrākṣus te ṛṣayo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātrimśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam,
S01sumagavu:583: SumAv_222 na tathā dvādaśavarṣābhyastaḥ śamathacittasya kalyatāṃ janayati,
S01sumagavu:588: SumAv_223 atha te ṛṣayo yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā,
S01sumagavu:589: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte tasthuḥ.
S01sumagavu:590: SumAv_224 tato bhagavatā teṣām ṛṣīṇām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01sumagavu:591: yāṃ śrutvā tair ṛṣibhir viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā śrotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣāt kṛtam.
S01sumagavu:592: SumAv_225 atha te ṛṣayo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paricārya saṃprasthitāḥ.
S01sumagavu:593: SumAv_226 tena khalu samayena puṇḍravardhane nagare 'ṣṭādaśa dvārāṇy ababhūvan.
S01sumagavu:594: SumAv_227 atha bhagavata etad abhavat: yad ahaṃ paścimena dvāreṇa pravekṣyāmi,
S01sumagavu:596: yan nv aham aṣṭādaśa buddhān abhinirmāya svayaṃ paścimena dvāreṇa praveśayam iti.
S01sumagavu:597: SumAv_228 atha bhagavān aṣṭādaśa buddhān abhinirmāyā svayaṃ paścimena dvāreṇa praviṣṭaḥ.
S01sumagavu:598: SumAv_229 bhagavataḥ purapraveśe evaṃrūpāṇy āścaryāṇy atyadbhutāni bhavanty anyāni ca:
S01sumagavu:609: gṛhagatāni ca vividhāni vādyabhāṇḍāni svayaṃ nadanti,
S01sumagavu:620: SumAv_230 evaṃvidhayā vibhūtyā praviśya yena sumāgadhāyā niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ.
S01sumagavu:621: SumAv_231 atha sumāgadhā svayam eva gośīrṣacandanodakena bhṛṅgāraṃ pūrayitvā bhagavataḥ pādodakam anuprayacchati bhikṣusaṃghasya ca.
S01sumagavu:622: SumAv_232 tataḥ sumāgadhā bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatyaivam āha:
S01sumagavu:623: dhanyās te paravādivādamathanaṃ paśyanti ye te mukhaṃ
S01sumagavu:624: vistīrṇe sadasi sthitasya vacanaṃ śṛṇvanti ye vā mudā /
S01sumagavu:625: lābhas tasya mahān bhaviṣyati ca yaḥ pādau tava śrīnidher
S01sumagavu:626: mūrdhnā caiva karadvayena vinayāt saṃpīḍya vandiṣyate //
S01sumagavu:627: SumAv_233 atha bhagavān purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ,
S01sumagavu:628: sukhopaviṣṭaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastena saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati.
S01sumagavu:629: SumAv_234 atha puṇḍravardhananivāsī janakāyo bhagavantam apaśyaṃs tadgṛhaṃ bhettum ārabdhaḥ. tato bhagavatā tadgṛhaṃ sphaṭikamayam abhinirmitaṃ,
S01sumagavu:630: yataḥ sarvo mahājanakāya ādarśanagatam iva bhagavantaṃ bhuñjamānaṃ paśyati bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca.
S01sumagavu:632: sphaṭikamayam abhūt tad eva ramyaṃ maṇikanakākṣaratnabhakticitraṃ /
S01sumagavu:633: sthitam iva purato munīndracandraṃ nagarajano 'pi nirīkṣate samagraḥ //
S01sumagavu:634: SumAv_236 prasādāromāñcitasarvagātrāḥ kṛtāñjaliṃ mūrdhni nipātya hastam /
S01sumagavu:635: narā namanti sma munīndracandraṃ surā ivendraṃ bhavanodarastham //
S01sumagavu:636: SumAv_237 atha bhagavān kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ.
S01sumagavu:637: SumAv_238 tataḥ sumāgadhāpramukho 'ntarjanakāyas te ca nāgarās te ca ṛṣayas te ca devāsuragaruḍayakṣagandharvakinnaramahoragā bhagavantaṃ parivāryāvasthitāḥ.
S01sumagavu:638: SumAv_239 tato bhagavatā teṣāṃ ca tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃpravedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01sumagavu:639: yāṃ śrutvā kaiścic chrotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣāt kṛtaṃ,
S01sumagavu:642: kaiścit pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhattvaṃ sākṣāt kṛtaṃ,
S01sumagavu:651: SumAv_240 yad bhūyasā sā parṣad buddhanimnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā.
S01sumagavu:653: tadā bhikṣavo bhagavantam evam āhuḥ: āścaryaṃ bhagavann,
S01sumagavu:655: yat sumāgadhayā bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya buddhakāryaṃ kṛtam iti.
S01sumagavu:657: na bhikṣava etarhy eva yathātīte 'py adhvani buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya kāñcanamālayā yad buddhakāryaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S01sumagavu:659: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kurute, bhāṣiṣye.
S01sumagavu:662: 'tīte 'dhvani viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi,
S01sumagavu:663: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān,
S01sumagavu:664: sa bārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve.
S01sumagavu:665: SumAv_244 tena khalu punaḥ samayena kṛkī nāma rājā babhūva.
S01sumagavu:666: SumAv_245 tasya duhitā kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jātā, tasyā mātāpitṛbhyāṃ kāñcanamāleti nāma kṛtam.
S01sumagavu:667: SumAv_246 sā unnītā vardhitā mahatī saṃvṛttā, rājñaḥ kṛkina iṣṭā kāntā priyā manāpā saṃvṛttā.
S01sumagavu:668: SumAv_247 sā pañcaśataparivārā bhagavato darśanāyopasaṃkrāntā, tasyā bhagavatā dharmo deśitaḥ.
S01sumagavu:669: SumAv_248 tayā taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā bhagavato 'nitike mahān cittaprasāda utpanno,
S01sumagavu:671: SumAv_249 tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājñā kṛkinā daśa svapnā dṛṣṭāḥ:
S01sumagavu:682: SumAv_250 taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhītaś trastaś cintayati:
S01sumagavu:683: mā me itonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitasya cāntarāya iti.
S01sumagavu:684: SumAv_251 tato rājñā svapnādhyāyavido brāhmaṇān āhūya svapnān niveditavān.
S01sumagavu:685: SumAv_252 te kāñcanamālāṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayanti: rājan,
S01sumagavu:686: yā te sarvajanapriyā tasyā rudhireṇa yajño yaṣṭavyaḥ,
S01sumagavu:689: svapnān dāruṇān dṛṣṭvā rājyajīvitahāriṇo 'nenopāyena svastir devasya bhaviṣyati.
S01sumagavu:690: SumAv_253 rājā saṃlakṣayati: sarvajanapriyā me kāñcanamālā,
S01sumagavu:691: tāṃ vyāpādayitukāmā brāhmaṇā evam āhuḥ. varaṃ mamaiva maraṇaṃ,
S01sumagavu:693: SumAv_254 kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ,
S01sumagavu:694: kāñcanamālayā dṛṣṭaḥ. sā kathayati: kim evaṃ cintāparo,
S01sumagavu:696: iti. tena sa vṛttānto vistareṇa niveditaḥ. sā kathayati:
S01sumagavu:697: eṣa bhagavān kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho bārāṇasīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve,
S01sumagavu:698: taṃ bhagavantaṃ gatvā pṛcchatha. yathā te bhagavān vyākaroti tathaivaṃ dhāraya.
S01sumagavu:699: SumAv_255 tato rājā mahatā śrīsamudāyena kāñcanamālayā sārdhaṃ barāṇasyā nirgatya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S01sumagavu:700: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ,
S01sumagavu:703_0: SumAv_256 atha bhagavān kṛkinaṃ rājānaṃ dharmayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati
S01sumagavu:703_1: samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati. anekaparyāyeṇa dharmayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya
S01sumagavu:704: SumAv_257 atha kṛkī rājā daśa svapnān nivedyaivam āha: mā me,
S01sumagavu:706: tatonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitasya cāntarāya iti.
S01sumagavu:707: SumAv_258 bhagavān āha: mā bhaiṣīs tvaṃ,
S01sumagavu:709: na tavetonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyatīti jīvitasya cāntarāyaḥ.
S01sumagavu:714: vātāyanena hastī nirgacchan puccho lagna iti,
S01sumagavu:715: bhaviṣyaty anāgate 'dhvani varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S01sumagavu:716: sa sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvendhanakṣayād ivāgnir anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyatīti. tasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle aśrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayas,
S01sumagavu:717: te rudanto 'śrumukhān bandhūn utsṛjya pravrajya vihāreṣu gṛhasaṃjñām utpādayiṣyanti,
S01sumagavu:722: tasyaiva śravakā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti śraddhānāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ,
S01sumagavu:728: tasyaiva śrāvakāḥ śaktuprasthasya hetor indriyabalabodhyaṅgāni saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
S01sumagavu:733: tasyaiva śrāvakās taṃ tīrthikavākyam anugṛhya saddharmeṇa samīkariṣyanti,
S01sumagavu:738: tasyaiva śrāvakā asaṃyatās te śīlavanto bhikṣūn niṣkāśayiṣyanti,
S01sumagavu:743: tasyaiva śrāvakā āryasaṃghasya pratipāditam ārāmaṃ saṃgham ālaṃbīkṛtya kecid abhāvitakāyā abhāvitacittā abhāvitaprajñāḥ saṃghād ācchidya puṣpaphalaṃ svajanebhyo dāsyanti,
S01sumagavu:748: tasyaiva śrāvakā abhāvitakāyā abhāvitacittā abhāvitaprajñā ātmanāpattim āpannāḥ śrāddhānām api bhikṣūṇām āpattiṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyanti,
S01sumagavu:753: tasmin samaye vikalendriyā api rājāno bhaviṣyanti,
S01sumagavu:757: paṭo 'ṣṭādaśabhir janair ākṛṣyate na ca śīryata iti,
S01sumagavu:766: mā bhaiṣīs tvaṃ, mahārāja, na tavetonidānaṃ rājyāc cyutir bhaviṣyati jīvitāntarāyo vā.
S01sumagavu:767: SumAv_259 tato bhagavatā tasya rājñas tasya ca mahājanakāyasya tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01sumagavu:768: yāṃ śrutvā caturaśītyā prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam.
S01sumagavu:769: SumAv_260 kāñcanamālayā bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya buddhakāryaṃ kṛtam.
S01sumagavu:770: SumAv_261 kiṃ manyadhve, bhikṣavaḥ yāsau kāñcanamālā iyam eva sā sumāgadheti.
S01sumagavu:771: SumAv_262 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ: kiṃ bhadanta,
S01sumagavu:772: kāñcanamālayā karma kṛtaṃ yenāḍhye kule pratyajātā yena kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jātā iti.
S01sumagavu:775: pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni. kāñcanamālayaiva,
S01sumagavu:777: karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni. ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati. na,
S01sumagavu:783: api tūpātteṣu eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca.
S01sumagavu:784: SumAv_264 na pranaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api /
S01sumagavu:785: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
S01sumagavu:789: tayā pratyekabuddhasya caitye nānāvicitrāṃ palālamālāṃ granthayitvā samāropya prasannacittayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam.
S01sumagavu:790: SumAv_266 anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yatrayatropapadye 'haṃ tatratatra kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jāyeyam iti. kiṃ manyadhve,
S01sumagavu:792: iyam asau kāñcanamālā. yad anayā prasannacittayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S01sumagavu:793: tena pañcajanmaśatāni kāñcanamālayā śirasi baddhayā jātā.
S01sumagavu:794: SumAv_267 paṇadvayaṃ ca tayā paṭāntāvabaddhaṃ vimucyāryasaṃghāya dattaṃ;
S01sumagavu:796: SumAv_268 atha bhagavān sumāgadhāpramukhaṃ puṇḍravardhananivāsinaṃ mahājanakāyam abhiprasādya prakrāntaḥ,
S01sumagavu:797: tathaiva rddhyā sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena śrāvastīm āgataḥ.
S01sumagavu:805: ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīya iti. tasmāt tarhi,
S01sumagavu:808: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāma ity evaṃ vo,
S01sumagavu:811: te ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti. sumāgadhāvadānaṃ samāptam.
